doc:
Peg Lynch https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peg_Lynch 0 Margaret Frances Lynch (November 25, 1916 – July 24, 2015) was an American writer, actress, and creator of the radio and television sitcoms Ethel and Albert, The Couple Next Door, and The Little Things in Life. She was the first woman to create, write, star in and own her own sitcom; she retained that ownership throughout her life. In total, Lynch wrote nearly 11,000 scripts for radio and television. Margaret_Frances_Lynch ( November_25_,_1916 – July_24_,_2015 ) was an_American_writer , actress , and creator of the_radio_and_television_sitcoms_Ethel_and_Albert , The_Couple Next_Door , and The_Little_Things in Life . She was the_first_woman to_create_,_write_,_star in and own her_own_sitcom ; she retained that ownership throughout her_life . In total , Lynch wrote nearly_11,000_scripts for radio_and_television .
